title: The Sun Stands Still
summary: Joshua 10 describes Israel’s victory over five Amorite kings. As Israel defends Gibeon, God causes panic among the enemies and sends hailstones. At Joshua’s request, the sun stands still to allow a complete victory.

faq.question: Why did the sun stand still?
faq.answer: Joshua prayed for extended daylight to finish the battle, and God answered.

faq.question: How else did God help Israel in the battle?
faq.answer: He sent hailstones that killed more enemies than the sword.
